hero.name: Gabriel Wilfried Yagaka Tagne
hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: 2 Years of Professional Experience
hero.description: Passionate Full-Stack Developer with expertise in React, Laravel, Django, and modern web technologies. Specialized in building secure, scalable applications with strong UI/UX focus and OWASP security principles.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.bio1: I'm a dedicated Full-Stack Developer with 2 years of professional experience, specializing in building robust web and mobile applications. I hold a Master's degree in IT Security from the University of Yaounde 1 and a Bachelor's in Computer Science from the University of Dschang.
about.bio2: My expertise spans across frontend technologies like React.js, React Native, Vue.js, and backend frameworks including Laravel, Django, FastAPI, and Node.js. I'm passionate about creating secure, user-centric applications while adhering to OWASP Top 10 security principles.
about.bio3: Currently, I work at Alshadows Technology as a Full-Stack Mobile and Web Developer, where I've contributed to multiple production applications including e-medical platforms, corporate websites, and mobile applications. I also collaborate on cutting-edge research in cyber deception and reinforcement learning with Dr. Charles Kamhoua from the U.S. Army Research Laboratory.
about.bio4: Beyond development, I'm committed to mentorship, regularly tutoring students in Computer Science, Web Development, and Cybersecurity. I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest technologies and security best practices.
